pkgmetadata.longdescription: Examples using 'Rcpp' to Interface R and C++ // Examples for Seamless R and C++ integration The 'Rcpp' package contains a C++ library that facilitates the integration of R and C++ in various ways. This package provides some usage examples. . Note that the documentation in this package currently does not cover all the features in the package. It is not even close. On the other hand, the site http://gallery.rcpp.org is regrouping a large number of examples for 'Rcpp'.
